\let\lslash\l
\renewcommand{\l}{\left}
\renewcommand{\r}{\right}
\renewcommand{\b}[1]{\l[#1\r]}
\newcommand{\p}[1]{\lp#1\rp}
\newcommand{\bb}[1]{\la#1\ra}
\renewcommand{\st}{\text{ s.t. }}
\renewcommand{\and}{\text{ and }}
\newcommand{\forsome}{\text{ for some }}

\newcommand{\re}[1]{\cev{#1}}

\newcommand{\quotient}[2]{\faktor{#1}{#2}}

\newcommand{\la}{\raisebox{0.25ex}{$\scaleobj{0.65}{\big\lgroup}$}}
\newcommand{\ra}{\raisebox{0.25ex}{$\scaleobj{0.65}{\big\rgroup}$}}

\newcommand{\lb}{\left[}
\newcommand{\rb}{\right]}

\newcommand{\lp}{\left(}
\newcommand{\rp}{\right)}

\renewcommand{\ul}[1]{\underline{#1}}
\newcommand{\ol}[1]{#1^{-1}}
\newcommand{\inv}[1]{#1^{\mathsf{-1}}}

\newcommand{\subb}{\sqsubseteq}
\newcommand{\supb}{\sqsupseteq}

\newcommand{\bdot}{\boldsymbol{\cdot}}

\newcommand{\psubseteq}{\subseteq}
\newcommand{\psubset}{\subset}

\newcommand{\eqrep}{\equiv}

\newcommand{\defn}[1]{\uline{#1}}

\newcommand{\undervec}[1]{\underaccent{\vec}{#1}}

\newcommand{\overlap}{\preccurlyeq}
\newcommand{\supp}[1]{\underline{#1}}
\newcommand{\osum}[1]{\bigoplus_{#1}}
\newcommand{\bset}{\la b^*,-\ra}
\newcommand{\dset}{\la -, d^*\ra}
\newcommand{\shift}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\conj}[1]{#1_{\mathsf{c}}}
\newcommand{\reflect}[1]{\bar{#1}}
\newcommand{\overbar}[1]{\mkern 1.5mu\overline{\mkern-1.5mu#1\mkern-1.5mu}\mkern 1.5mu}
\newcommand{\olsi}[1]{\,\overline{\!{#1}}}
\newcommand{\ols}[1]{\mskip1\thinmuskip\overline{\mskip-1\thinmuskip {#1} \mskip-1\thinmuskip}\mskip1\thinmuskip}
\newcommand{\rev}[1]{#1^{\mathsf{T}}}
\newcommand{\li}[1]{#1^{\mathsf{L}}}
\newcommand{\ri}[1]{#1^{\mathsf{R}}}
\newcommand{\rconj}[1]{#1_{\mathsf{e}}}
\newcommand{\trans}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\epi}{c}
\newcommand{\mono}{j}

\newcommand{\ext}[1]{\E\xspace #1}
